column5: Cozy and Relaxing Vacation Home within a natural setting, totally updated place that you'll want to stay in. Conveniently located 20 minutes to DFW Airport, Downtown Dallas, Cowboys and Rangers Stadium, Verizon Theater, and Six Flags. 10 min to Joe Pool Lake and Outlets, Walmart right at the corner. House has a nice patio where you can hang out and have a nice evening, cable, Netflix, fireplace, and new appliances.
